long_description: The artificial Yakima Side Loader brackets create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells, caps or in other special circumstances. Narrow bracket is designed to squeeze into small spaces, such as between a side window and the top of a camper shell. Custom installation is relatively straight-forward, but does involve drilling a few holes. All mounting hardware and instructions included. For a complete rack, you also need 1 set of 1A Raingutter Towers and 1 pair of Yakima crossbars, sold separately. Depending on your vehicle and situation, you may need 1 pair or 2 pairs of Side Loader Brackets; refer to Yakima's Fit List for fit information.
short_description: The artificial Yakima Side Loader brackets create a base on which to mount 1A Raingutter Towers to camper shells, caps or in other special circumstances.
